content: Hi all. Does anyone have any 8-day or daily gridded GPP obs on disk/tape anywhere? E.g. FluxNET interpolated, BESS, or anything like that. I have some code to convert the raw BESS tiles (http://environment.snu.ac.kr/bess_flux/) into a gridded product, but they're hosted as 1-km resolution tiles on an FTP server so it'll be a long endeavor. Wanted to check here first.
Not daily, but I could point you to monthly gridded GPP (1982-2008) from FLUXNET-MTE on glade if that would help.
